headline: Is 3M (MMM) Offering Value After Recent PFAS Litigation Focus And Mixed Share Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether 3M is fairly priced or offering value right now, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. 3M last closed at US$164.17, with returns of 1.5% year to date and 11.3% over the past year, set against shorter term moves of a 5.0% decline over 7 days and a 2.2% decline over 30 days. Recent headlines around 3M have focused on the company and its long standing role in industrials and consumer products, alongside ongoing attention...
